name: What Lies Beneath (Garret Browning)
description:
Within the world of What Lies Beneath there is a benevolent figurehead of a giant network corporation who is advertising data chip implantations which will allow for seamless integration between the host’s mind and the grand network (to allow for advanced thought processing and intelligence). 

However, the true intentions of this data chip are to connect all those who undergo the procedure to submit complete control over to the corporation network as a servant to this neural hive mind. To put a stop to this madness, an internal team of scientists within the organization (who do not agree with the figurehead’s ideals) have developed a modified data chip in secret with hopes of implanting someone who can help their cause. 

The one who is implanted with this chip is the only hope for defeating this organization from the inside out. Only they can truly discover and destroy what lies beneath (within the secret underground lab facility in which these experiments and procedures are taking part).

Developed By:
Garret Browning
Elyot Lamb
Louis Miguel Moldez
Gabrielle Marie Rivera
Kniel Francis Sullera
Mark Taylor

[Prototype Demo]
